thread.section_title: SpaStore.co.nz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SpaStore.co.nz | spastore.co.nz
thread.title: karen

author: karen
title: karen
text: Phoned Vortex enquiring about their spa pool range and talked to Mary who was very honest and helpful. Also phoned other companies who put down their competitors. So I did a little on line research myself and chose Vortex. Customer service was excellent. Frances dropped off my spa and was most helpful and friendly on a hot day, that I fed him lunch. The only thing that I did not like was that hardener was not supplied (I had spent the extra $1,000 and bought everything I would need for a year). My bank account was somewhat depleted by the spa (actually completely depleted), and I did think that either hardener or softener should be included in the package, as I had yet to get to know my spa. Other than that I am very happy with Vortex and with my spa!
